section.heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 107–314, div. A, title V, § 515(a), Dec. 2, 2002, 116 Stat. 2539]
Funeral honors functions at funerals for veterans

content.p: Performance by a Reserve of funeral honors functions at the funeral of a veteran (as defined in section 1491(h) of this title) may not be considered to be a period of drill or training, but may be performed as funeral honors duty under section 12503 of this title.
